statements: DELETE FROM cancer_patients WHERE patient_id = 123 AND insurance_provider = 'Aetna';

DELETE FROM BillingInformation WHERE PaymentStatus = 'Unpaid' AND BillingAmount > 1000

DELETE FROM treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 500 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
